id: scenario-value-scanner-child-scenarios-neighborhood-child recognizes care labor in neighborhood economy
title: Child recognizes care labor in neighborhood economy
description: Child recognizes care labor in neighborhood economy
content:
Scenario: Child recognizes care labor in neighborhood economy
    Given Emma interacts with store workers during shopping
    And she is learning to see invisible care work
    When Emma completes a transaction
    Then her personal_agent should prompt recognition of care labor
    And the agent should say "Thank the checker for scanning your items"
    And Emma should learn to see stockers, checkers, farmers, truckers
    And she should understand economy is made of people caring for each other
    And awareness of care labor should extend beyond family
    And she should be socialized into seeing economy as care relationships
